EmailTemplate.subject: Join Honeywell For Brunch at The Paris Air Show – RSVP By June 7th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Join Us in Paris Paris Air Show 2019 Honeywell Brunch Date June 16, 2019
Time 11am-2pm
Location Le Pré Catelan – Salons Bois de Boulogne Route de la Grande Cascade 75000 Paris
Kick off your Paris Air Show experience in style with Honeywell, and enjoy an exquisite brunch at a world-famous restaurant in the heart of Bois de Boulogne.
Our senior leaders are looking forward to welcoming you at this stunning venue.
Please join us.
Kindly RSVP by June 7, 2019.
Contact us at aero.marketing@honeywell.com <[[mailto:aero.marketing@honeywell.com]]> with any questions.
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019ParisAirShow_BrunchInvite.html]]>
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
